/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by a variety of buildings and trees. Cars and bicycles add to the dynamic nature of the scene, hinting at the rhythm of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the bustling activity below. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, which shines brightly in the top right corner, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
